entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
